entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as a tough person who never kills unnecessarily and brings people in alive where possible. He is contrasted with the Death Eaters.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is described as being ill, but also making an effort to drag himself up to Snape's office. His absence from the World Cup is questioned.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape's office is mentioned as a place where Crouch made an effort to go despite being ill.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is described as ferreting around on the rocky floor looking for bones.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having a brother who is Crouch's personal assistant.

relationships.description: Crouch made an effort to drag himself up to Snape's office.
